name: Spring Escape - SAGE 2022 demo
description:
Spring Escape is a singleplayer 2D platformer about a piece of dirt digging its way through various obstacle-filled levels.

Use your digging abilities to sneak from deadly cameras, avoid pesky drills, and dash through uncontrollable slime in this demo's 4 levels.

The game also features a speedrun mode option for the fastest of players, and mysterious collectibles for those who prefers exploring.
Lots of settings to customize the game are also included, alongside assist options for people who want a more chill experience.

Music by bouncytorch
